title: Grum: 关于侦测器的评论
author: chyx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ff98sha 于 2017-2-26 21:40 编辑 
They should strong power adjacent blocks, that will be fixed. The rest is working as intended. Sources give of 0 or 15 power and they should emit a pulse long enough to de-power a torch, they do so now.
Grum说侦测器将能强充能它对着的方块 而且增加输出脉冲长度使他能够关闭红石火把  而其余的新加入特性（如输出信号强度为15等）将会保留



https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecra ... s_to_pe_not/d8rb3df

replies.author: jiongjionger
replies.txt_content: 总觉得观察者方块引入的多人联机风险还是要好好考虑。例如目前插件无法检测的高频。
